name: speechifier
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who gives a speech or speeches, especially in a boring way or in a way that shows they think they are important: At the awards ceremony, he was among the best of the many speechifiers.
More examplesFewer examplesAndrew is the speechifier in the family, and he may talk too much for the play's good.The grand speechifier was reduced to utter panic and speechlessness.It is a mistake to believe that Robespierre was a speechifier in love with general ideas and adept only at phrase-mongering and theories.He was both a speechifier and a prolific writer.
